SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.board_title AS boardTitle, b.board_status AS boardStatus, p.post_title AS title, p.post_status AS postStatus, p.top_fixed AS fixed, u.full_name AS userName, p.create_date AS createDate FROM board b INNER JOIN post p ON b.board_id = p.board_id INNER JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id
AND p.post_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND u.full_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND b.board_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY p.create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
